Review Title: A Great Reason to Overnight in Basel
Review Text: Dinner at Roots was one of the highlights of our vacation in Switzerland.  We opted for the full tasting menu with wine pairings and enjoyed every minute of our 3.5 hour meal!  Incredibly creative taste combinations and expertly paired wines with each course, all explained in detail by staff members who truly enjoy their jobs - not to mention a great conversation with the Chef himself!  We made a point of staying overnight in Basel to experience Roots and are glad we did.  The restaurant will be moving to a more intimate location in the city and I can only imagine that it will achieve its third Michelin start after the move.

An Absolute amazing overall experience, you can tell the Chefs love what they do and they head chef loves food and creating delicious tasting food.
Great idea of making the vegetables sing and having the meat as a side to the vegetables would be cool to see more places follow this idea in the future.

Review Title: A wonderful evening, food and service
Review Text:
This restaurant is very popular for people who know and it is not always easy to get a reservation but it is definitely worth the effort!  From the moment we arrived until the moment we left we were treated with personal, efficient service, excellent food and delicious wines.

There was a handwritten note (with our names) on our table to welcome us and the first drinks arrived exactly on time!  There is no a la carte menu, rather a menu surprise  and you have the option of choosing 5, 6, 7, 8 or 9 courses - we chose 6.

Every course was just the right sized portion, delicious and exquisitely presented.  The explanations were provided at each time and the staff were perfect.  The restaurant is on the riverside and the view is ever changing.

I have no hesitation in recommending this restaurant - as long as there is still a place for us to return!

The food is incredible the service is such a pity for such great food. The year has been tough due to covid. Taking my husband out was a big deal for me. Lousiest table. We had to threaten to leave till we got a better table? We stayed but was ruined for me. It’s such a pity. Kindness, humility, elegance. Compassion is just not there. And please dim the lights! As said best food in a long time but service no good!!!

Review Title: Single worst experience I ever had in my life with a restaurant
Review Text:
I had a reservation for 10 people with my guest from the US for an important business dinner. Despite that I was informed via email a few hours before the dinner that paper certificates are accepted we were not allowed to enter the restaurant with our colleague from the US who just recently had his third booster vaccine shot from Pfizer and clearly could prove his vaccination status via paper certificate as is common practice in the US. 
Instead we were sent to an HIV test center in town for Covid testing. Maybe one just needs any sort of negative test as long as it’s attached to a QR code? 
Anyway our group got split into several parties which was very disappointing. 
Please do not go to this restaurant with guests holding paper certificates only, it’s just an endless waste of your time. Dreadful!

Very good experience. We have been there for lunch and choosed the business lunch menu of 3 dishes. The service was good and fast. Food was just delicious. Best meal we had in Basel so far. Prices are fine considering the range of restaurant.

Review Title: Pleasant, professional service with excellent quality food
Review Text: I went for lunch with Business colleagues on 16th January 2019 and found the service to be exceptional and better than expected. The staff were friendly, professional and the food - indeed the entire experience - was first class. Starting with the waitress who, slowly poured the sauce over the meals, while in front of their guests - to great effect - to the fact that the Chef came out himself to ask if everything was to our liking. Great experience.

Very affordable and delicious lunch set. Choice between two appetizers and three main courses. Dessert is optional. Super fresh ingredients and very tasty. Staff are great. Nice location by the river.
Amazing Chef Pascal Steffen, rising star... The  Chef is working with local products and the result in the plate is just fantastic.

Review Title: Good service at the Roots restaurant
Review Text: I tried the Roots restaurant. Very friendly service there. Was served nice cold coca cola with separate ice supplied. They try to become a Michelin star restaurant some time in the future. I tried the meal of the day, which looked good. It tasted alright.

Review Title: Always an experience - keep it up!
Review Text:
Over the last few years we have been able to follow the incredible development of Roots Basel. What Pascal Steffen and his team do every day is simply top.

Our 10 course menu with wine accompaniment (with and without alcohol) was an experience in itself... 

The Roots vegetable garden is a taste experience with around 30 different vegetables. 

The trout with broccoli was perfectly cooked, couldn't be better!

Risotto with corn - once different!!

The main course with the quail and kohlrabi, along with the ingenious sauce, which had power and a lot of deep, was just awesome. A huge leap too soon! 

The dessert creations, whether with zucchetti, olive oil or fruity, were the perfect conclusion.

The whole thing was rounded off by the warm and perfect service team. 

We will definitely come back.

We were at the Nespresso Gourmet Nights 2024. The menu was wonderfully put together and the wines were highly recommended.
It was a wonderful evening with the star chef ⭐️ Pascal Steffen.
The team is young, super friendly and attentive. I myself have a few food allergies, but this was always taken into account. 🔝👍🙏

Review Title: Excellent quality in a warm hall
Review Text:
Roots is a very warm restaurant on the inside. The whole ambience was perfect. 
Very pleasant service with empathetic staff. We had a very good feeling from the very first moment. It was great that the chefs also served us the courses and explained them. Each individual course was very well coordinated. You get excellent quality for your money here.

A truly unforgettable experience.
It is a bit out of the way but still very beautiful right on the Rhine. Beautiful, modern interior.
The service and chefs are very friendly.
A drop of sauce dripped onto my shirt when it was served and I was given a glass of homemade jus as a gift, so it was worth it.

The food and the accompanying wine pairing are really very good. Imaginative courses with lots of vegetables and top sauces. I will be back.

What is made from vegetables here is a high art. Fine, harmonious flavors, surprising textures, smells, colors, shapes - here you can enjoy with all your senses. I was here a few years ago, after Mr. Steffen had just come to Basel. Even then he was in the top league. But he has improved even further. I am really impressed. I would also like to particularly highlight his young service team, which is competent, extremely friendly and very refreshing. Thank you for this special experience, we will be happy to come back and will not wait another 5 years.

Everything is just right here. A warm welcome, attentive service and the food is excellent. The presentation of the plates alone is a small miracle. I also particularly liked the fact that the chef brought "his" plate to the table and explained it.

Roots is top notch as usual. The kitchen and service team has developed further compared to last year - a big compliment to the whole team.

All of the dishes from the gourmet menu were an experience in themselves. Perfect cooking points, great flavor combinations, amazing vegetables and much more round off the whole thing.

The service accompanies the high-quality kitchen at the front with a lot of warmth and expertise.

The wine and non-alcoholic accompaniment to the individual dishes harmonized perfectly.

We'll be happy to come back!

Review Title: A half-hearted two stars!!! The rules are the same in Europe, even if of course Switzerland is not there!!
Review Text:
Beautiful place on the banks of the Rhine, unfortunately the terrace is closed in mid-September, we have the impression that it never existed since everything is desperately empty!!!! So dine inside, it’s hot, no air conditioning. The staff is impersonal!!! Jeans, sneakers and white shirt, well not really anymore!!!
No decoration, just a supermarket candle, in short a little tight for this level. Good flavors, the wines match the dishes.
A little tight in terms of desserts.
